The course is way to much to learn, 3x 3h exams are over the top and I have never experienced something like this.
For the future I suggest noting the duration of the 3 exams in the syllabus, so that exchangees are warned.
老師很認真授課，總經好難......（但可能因為是學期課所以老師就cover很多範圍了）
老師上課步調有點快，作業每次都很多很難，考試的難度也希望可以調整，有些吃力；但老師上課很認真！
the professor has great knowledge in macroeconomy. but the exam is a little heavy for me personally.

Thank you, professor!
